caption.p: EPA + DHA and EPA + DHA + DPA contents per standard serve (135 g) in the longissimus dorsi muscle of prime lambs supplemented with diverse dietary PUFA sources (EPA: eicosapentaenoic acid; DPA: docosapentaenoic acid and DHA: docosahexaenoic acid; RBO, CO, RPO, FSO and SO were wheat-based pellets infused with 50 ml/kg DM of oil from rice bran, canola, rumen-protected, flaxseed and safflower sources, respectively).
